name: Sharpness
description: Obtain a Sharpness enchanted sword (increases melee damage)
tips: Found commonly in enchanting tables, villager trades, and dungeon loot

name: Smite
description: Obtain a Smite enchanted sword (extra damage to undead mobs)
tips: Excellent for Nether fortresses and the Wither fight

name: Bane of Arthropods
description: Obtain a Bane of Arthropods enchanted sword (extra damage to spiders and silverfish)
tips: Useful for cave spider spawners and silverfish in strongholds

name: Knockback
description: Obtain a Knockback enchanted sword (increases knockback distance)
tips: Great for keeping mobs at distance, but can make killing harder

name: Fire Aspect
description: Obtain a Fire Aspect enchanted sword (sets targets on fire)
tips: Provides cooked meat from animals automatically

name: Looting
description: Obtain a Looting enchanted sword (increases mob drops)
tips: Essential for rare drops like wither skeleton skulls and ender pearls

name: Sweeping Edge
description: Obtain a Sweeping Edge enchanted sword (increases sweep attack damage)
tips: Java Edition only - great for mob farms and crowd control

name: Power
description: Obtain a Power enchanted bow (increases arrow damage)
tips: Power V can one-shot many mobs at full charge

name: Punch
description: Obtain a Punch enchanted bow (increases arrow knockback)
tips: Useful for keeping mobs at distance and pushing mobs off ledges

name: Flame
description: Obtain a Flame enchanted bow (arrows set targets on fire)
tips: Adds fire damage over time and can light TNT from distance

name: Infinity
description: Obtain an Infinity enchanted bow (no arrow consumption)
tips: Requires at least one arrow in inventory. Incompatible with Mending

name: Quick Charge
description: Obtain a Quick Charge enchanted crossbow (decreases reload time)
tips: Quick Charge III makes crossbow reload faster than bow draw

name: Multishot
description: Obtain a Multishot enchanted crossbow (fires three arrows at once)
tips: Only consumes one arrow but cannot be combined with Piercing

name: Piercing
description: Obtain a Piercing enchanted crossbow (arrows pass through entities)
tips: Great for hitting multiple mobs in a line, incompatible with Multishot

name: Loyalty
description: Obtain a Loyalty enchanted trident (trident returns after throwing)
tips: Requires drowned farming for trident. Incompatible with Riptide

name: Impaling
description: Obtain an Impaling enchanted trident (extra damage to aquatic mobs)
tips: In Java Edition, only affects aquatic mobs. In Bedrock, affects all mobs in water

name: Riptide
description: Obtain a Riptide enchanted trident (propels player when thrown in water/rain)
tips: Great for fast travel in rain or water. Incompatible with Loyalty and Channeling

name: Channeling
description: Obtain a Channeling enchanted trident (summons lightning on hit during storms)
tips: Can convert creepers to charged creepers and pigs to zombified piglins

name: Protection
description: Obtain Protection enchanted armor (reduces all damage)
tips: Most versatile armor enchantment, stacks across armor pieces

name: Fire Protection
description: Obtain Fire Protection enchanted armor (reduces fire damage and burn time)
tips: Highly recommended for Nether exploration and blaze fighting

name: Blast Protection
description: Obtain Blast Protection enchanted armor (reduces explosion damage and knockback)
tips: Useful for creeper encounters and Wither fights

name: Projectile Protection
description: Obtain Projectile Protection enchanted armor (reduces projectile damage)
tips: Great for skeleton dungeons and fighting blazes

name: Thorns
description: Obtain Thorns enchanted armor (damages attackers)
tips: Causes extra durability loss. Found commonly on drowned

name: Feather Falling
description: Obtain Feather Falling enchanted boots (reduces fall damage)
tips: Essential for End exploration and building at heights

name: Depth Strider
description: Obtain Depth Strider enchanted boots (increases underwater movement speed)
tips: Incompatible with Frost Walker. Great for ocean exploration

name: Frost Walker
description: Obtain Frost Walker enchanted boots (turns water to ice when walking)
tips: Treasure enchantment only - found in chests or villager trades

name: Soul Speed
description: Obtain Soul Speed enchanted boots (increases speed on soul sand/soil)
tips: Only obtainable through piglin bartering or bastion loot

name: Swift Sneak
description: Obtain Swift Sneak enchanted leggings (increases sneaking speed)
tips: Only found in ancient city chests - use skulk sensor mechanics

name: Respiration
description: Obtain Respiration enchanted helmet (extends underwater breathing)
tips: Adds 15 seconds of breathing per level, great with Aqua Affinity

name: Aqua Affinity
description: Obtain Aqua Affinity enchanted helmet (normal mining speed underwater)
tips: Essential for underwater builds and ocean monument raids

name: Efficiency
description: Obtain an Efficiency enchanted tool (increases mining speed)
tips: Efficiency V with a beacon haste makes instant mining possible

name: Silk Touch
description: Obtain a Silk Touch enchanted tool (blocks drop themselves)
tips: Required for glass, ice, ender chests, and spawner-adjacent builds

name: Fortune
description: Obtain a Fortune enchanted tool (increases certain block drops)
tips: Fortune III on diamonds averages 2.2 diamonds per ore

name: Unbreaking
description: Obtain an Unbreaking enchanted item (increases durability)
tips: Works on all items with durability. Unbreaking III gives 4x effective durability

name: Mending
description: Obtain a Mending enchanted item (XP repairs item durability)
tips: Treasure enchantment - best obtained from librarian villagers

name: Curse of Vanishing
description: Find an item with Curse of Vanishing (item disappears on death)
tips: Found in dungeon loot and villager trades. Can be useful in PvP

name: Curse of Binding
description: Find an item with Curse of Binding (cannot be removed once worn)
tips: Found in dungeon loot. Useful for keeping armor on armor stands

name: Luck of the Sea
description: Obtain a Luck of the Sea enchanted fishing rod (increases treasure chance)
tips: Increases chance of enchanted books, bows, and fishing rods

name: Lure
description: Obtain a Lure enchanted fishing rod (decreases wait time)
tips: Reduces wait time by 5 seconds per level. Combine with Luck of the Sea

name: Density
description: Obtain a Density enchanted mace (increases damage based on fall distance)
tips: 1.21 enchantment - adds 1 damage per block fallen per level

name: Breach
description: Obtain a Breach enchanted mace (reduces armor effectiveness)
tips: 1.21 enchantment - ignores 15% of armor per level

name: Wind Burst
description: Obtain a Wind Burst enchanted mace (creates wind burst on hit)
tips: 1.21 enchantment - launches you upward for combo attacks

name: Sharpness V
description: Obtain maximum level Sharpness V enchantment
tips: Requires combining two Sharpness IV books at an anvil

name: Protection IV (Full Set)
description: Obtain a full armor set with Protection IV on each piece
tips: Max protection cap is 80% damage reduction from enchantments

name: Efficiency V
description: Obtain maximum level Efficiency V enchantment
tips: With Haste II beacon, allows instant mining of stone
